name: Help wolfy get back home
description:
Hwgbh is game for game jam (like always) that i made in 5-6H 

it has 7 levels in total (the last being a joke) 

You move with WASD and can only move normally 10 times

Most levels you can beat first try and only level 5. 6. and 7. require more thinking

and umm...that's all  ... i have nothing more to say other than that i will probably use Wolfy in other games too
